abstracts.cdata!:
Millions in rural southwestern China
            have been uplifted from the vicious cycle of poverty by an
            innovative and exhaustive poverty reduction program that,
            for the first time in China, put money directly into
            villages, financing initiatives the residents themselves suggested.
